headline: Trimble Inc. (TRMB) Affirms Focus on Growing Software and Recurring Revenues
summary: Trimble Inc. (NASDAQ:TRMB) is one of the best tech stocks to buy, according to Cathie Wood. On September 11, at the Piper Sandler 4th Annual Growth Frontiers Conference, the company reiterated its shift towards a software-driven revenue model. The shift is part of the company’s bid to target $3 billion in annual recurring revenue and […]

headline: KOBELCO and Trimble Announce Expanded Collaboration
summary: KOBELCO Construction Machinery U.S.A. and Trimble® (Nasdaq: TRMB) today announced an expanded collaboration that makes the Trimble Earthworks grade control platform 2D guidance and control systems available directly through select KOBELCO dealers in North America. This new offering, launched as KOBELCO's certified Trimble Earthworks 2D grade control program, is now available at KOBELCO dealers across North America, enhancing machine productivity and jobsite precision.
